entry.title: Simple erb template with ruby example
entry.content:
{% codeblock test.erb %} Hello: <%= Prov.show_hostname("123")%> {% endcodeblock %}

{% codeblock prov.rb %} class Prov

def self.show_hostname(host)
    "--------#{host}-------"
end

end puts Prov.show_hostname("test") {% endcodeblock %}

{% codeblock generate.rb %} require 'erb' require './prov' renderer = ERB.new(File.read("test.erb")) puts renderer.result {% endcodeblock %}

$ ruby generate.rb
